trans-unit.source: Represents a read-only collection of <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ManifestSignatureInformation" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção somente leitura de objetos <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ManifestSignatureInformation" />.

trans-unit.source: To get a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ManifestSignatureInformationCollection> collection, call one of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ManifestSignatureInformation.VerifySignature%2A> method overloads.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ManifestSignatureInformationCollection> coleção, chamada do <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ManifestSignatureInformation.VerifySignature%2A> sobrecargas do método.

trans-unit.source: Each collection contains a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ManifestSignatureInformation> object for each manifest that was verified by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ManifestSignatureInformation.VerifySignature%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Cada coleção contém um <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ManifestSignatureInformation> objeto para cada manifesto que foi verificado com o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ManifestSignatureInformation.VerifySignature%2A> método.
